entry.title: Newsletter #126
entry.content:
TechThursday is here!

We are featuring a T-shirt clash after more than a year, this time it is Shidhin and Geshan but different colors:)

We would also like to welcome back Shidhin from his vacation. And here is your weekly quota of some interesting links

Enjoy!

  • 8 ways to become a better coder

  • [1602.07168] zerodb white paper

  • blob storage: how i used it to host my podcast mp3 files | noupe

  • design’s fully-baked deliverables and half-baked artifacts — ux immersion: interactions — medium

  • docker, alpine, garbage and you – mrjoy

  • dockerize your development workstation

  • don’t let chatops become chatoops – michael ansel

  • finding memory leaks in go programs

  • go object oriented design

  • how to fix the go package management problem

  • issue and pull request templates

  • leveling up your javascript – telerik developer network

  • logging v. instrumentation

  • new in symfony 2.8: clock mocking and time sensitive tests (symfony blog)

  • no cart left behind

  • playtime is over: investors want their money back

  • the $300 million button ux articles by uie

  • understanding git for real by exploring the .git directory — medium

entry.title: Newsletter #125
entry.content:

  • the rise and fall of everest (the app)

  • write code that is easy to delete, not easy to… — programming is terrible

entry.title: Newsletter #96
entry.content:
TechThursday is here!

We hope you are enjoying the lesser working hours because of Ramadan, here are the usual links to enjoy over the weekend.

and a huge list of links for you:

  • Do you really want to use XA with MySQL?
